description: This file sets up an agent with a specific model and tools, runs a query, and processes streaming response events, printing the resulting messages.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with models and tools to generate responses.

classes.name: RunResponseContentEvent
classes.description: Event indicating content in the response stream.

classes.name: ToolCallCompletedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating a tool call has completed.

classes.name: ToolCallStartedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating a tool call has started.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool for performing DuckDuckGo searches.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a query with the agent, streaming response events.
